title: ‘Gripping on for dear life’: Talking to the people drowning in Perth’s housing crisis
description:
What gets lost in the discussion about Perth’s unaffordability is how the mining boom has transformed the city into a sprawling ultra-suburbia where quality of life is great only for a lucky few. 
The post ‘Gripping on for dear life’: Talking to the people dr…
content:
Back in June, Reddit user mikigall posted a question on r/perth simply titled Perth rental crisis… mental health. 
How is everyones mental health, etc., coping during Perths rental crisis?! they ask… [+355 chars]
